item.title: My Personal Epic
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1537" align="alignright" width="225" caption="Sammydavisdog on Flickr"][/caption]

Hello, I'm Khaled. This is my blog, Warrior Spirit. It's kind of my personal epic.

It may seem a little presumptuous to suggest that my life is worthy of an epic, and maybe itâ€™s not yet. However, I believe that if I treat it as epic-worthy, it will live up to that calling. The whole point is simply to live as awesome a life as possible and hope that it proves worthy.
